Module BayesianClassifier
Package dataStructures

Class Edge

java.lang.Object
dataStructures.Edge
public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
This Class represents an edge of a general graph. A edge is composed by two nodes
Author:
Group 20

      Constructor

      w - weight value of an edge
      n1 - node that belongs to the edge
      n2 - the remain node that belongs to the edge

    • Edge

      public Edge​(double w, Node parent, Node child, boolean directed)
      Constructor - Overloading
      Parameters:
      w - weight value of an edge
      parent - the parent node of a directed edge
      child - the child node of a directed edge
      directed - boolean tag to identify this edges as directed
